website_summaries.verdict: With cutouts around the Achilles tendon and the instep, these boots offer ample protection without hampering your kicking.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors and sizes
Cutouts around Achilles and instep provide for better dexterity and mobility
Bottom has two reinforced vinyl straps to keep boots secure
Open at heel, ball of foot, and toes allow for better gripping
Light enough not to hamper kicking, but enough padding to protect
cons: The opening where you slide your foot into the boot is narrow, so use caution when putting these on

customer_reviews.title: Started to tear after only 1 year's light use
customer_reviews.text: I only spar once a week, and these foot guards began to break down with less than a year of use. I have the same brand of hand and shin guards, purchased at the same time, and those are still intact. The velcro still works fine, and the straps are holding up, but the tearing is front and center (like where your shoelaces would be). Not bad enough that I have to replace them yet, but I'll definitely be considering a different brand when I do.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a size 1 shoe so we ordered the child 1-2...when they in they were "WAY TOO SMALL" we were going to return them but would have had to pay return postage and $6.50 plus we didn't have spare time to go though the hassle because she needs them for tournament. We simply ordered a 3-4 the next size up and will try to pass these on to another child in her club.
customer_reviews.author: hybrid1

customer_reviews.title: 5 size regular shoes and the fit is nice - that is if you could put these on ...
customer_reviews.text: We got a Child Small for my son who wears 1-1.5 size regular shoes and the fit is nice - that is if you could put these on without ripping them - you can't. As other reviews mentioned the top opening is too tight. Now, after only a few uses these are still impossible to put on and they are ripped. The design is just not compatible with success. The brand that our dojo uses doesn't have the same issue, so I'll be going to that.
customer_reviews.author: new homeowner

customer_reviews.title: ) Good quality and just what my son needed
customer_reviews.text: My bad- I purchased an XL when I should have just purchased a L. However, these are the exact shoes we can buy through the dojo- but it takes too long for the headmaster to get them to us so I prefer to get my own on Amazon with prime shipping (Thank You, Amazon!) Good quality and just what my son needed. We will keep even though they are large because he is constantly growing and I am sure he'll be in them before i know it!
customer_reviews.author: Family!❤️

customer_reviews.title: Great for sparring
customer_reviews.text: Great for sparring. Be forewarned that these MUST air out. The chemical smell is very strong! I was hesitant to allow my child to wear them, but after 2-3 good days of airing them out, the smell goes away. I'd even suggest wiping them down with soap and water, or vinegar water, before use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Burris

customer_reviews.title: Once inside they fit great, but the opening is just too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids to replace their aging Macho kicks. Those fell apart due to age. These Lightning kicks are so tight that my kids had trouble getting their feet in them. Once inside they fit great, but the opening is just too small. This eventually resulted in the heel splitting as my son was putting one on. I would not buy this brand again. I wish Amazon carried the Macho kicks separately without having to buy a full set of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cartier

customer_reviews.title: Good retrofit for growing feet (color matched our Century gear)
customer_reviews.text: Our little one’s feet were outgrowing his original Century set, so we replaced just the shoes. Happily the color matched perfectly, and the fit was as expected. Looks and functions like the Century shoe.
customer_reviews.author: LanceD

customer_reviews.title: Protective Sparring Gear
customer_reviews.text: A bit more expensive than I would like to pay for a pair of foam foot coverings. But they will protect my child’s feet during sparring so in that senses it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperLife

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son his first pair through his karate school for the full suggested retail price. When my son outgrew them, I searched on Amazon and was very pleased to find them for at least 30% off the original price. They are exactly like the one he got from the school. His shoes are size 3, so I ordered medium (3-4) and they are excellent fit with a little bit of wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: M. Avery

customer_reviews.title: Where's the sizing chart???
customer_reviews.text: There is no sizing chart. Needed these for an upcoming tournament, so I ordered two sizes; both were too big. Hoping the final pair arrive and fit well. It's not that hard to put in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: M&D

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Grandson who needed them for Karate. They are well made and look and feel great. He loves them and is so happy to have his own sparring gear now for tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Likes Quality

customer_reviews.title: Run VERY small
customer_reviews.text: Run WAY small. My son is a big kids’ size 6 and I got the men’s medium and they do not fit. Unfortunately we tried them for a class so they can’t be returned. Big waste. His toes protrude.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok not that great. Similar to the gloves same made same materials, my son out grew the first pair and I had to get him a new pair. The later pair is busted on the side and the strap keeps coming off. It is still useable. Will need new pair soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Okay.  May be a size challenge.
customer_reviews.text: These were a 2nd attempt to find a boot for sparring practice in taekwondo. The size was great for me. I normally wear a size 15 shoe. I began to wonder if they were too large. The two thin plastic membranes at the bottom of the shoes created a challenge. During sparring the front or toes of my feet would slide out from inside. Constantly having to reach down and correct. Of course, it may be that the size I ordered was a wee bit too large.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams, Professional Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but kids may need a little help ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, but kids may need a little help putting them on. The ankle is a bit tight but I wouldn't think you would want these loose fitting. The strap is a bit much at first for the little ones to wrap around as it is pretty taut.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: They fit my 5 year old boy who wears size ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit my 5 year old boy who wears size 12 shoes. I purchased the smallest one here. The opening where the foot is inserted is small. We have to squeeze and stretch to get it in. The material is fairly light yet just thick enough for his level of sparring. I ended up cutting the tabs off on the bottom as it was causing discomfort. Few other folks purchased this product from our studio and stated the same and I helped resolve the discomfort issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding A+
customer_reviews.text: Way way cheaper then century gear and also cheaper then buying at karate school. My kids gear is exactly the same as the schools century brand. For kids who will get a year or two out of this it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyRed

customer_reviews.title: To uncomfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses for my son and unfortunately was super disappointed. The bottom straps were very poor quality and the plastic felt burned and sharp. They hurt my sons feet to the point her couldn’t wear them. My refund was approved right away, but for some reason the company only refunded me a fraction of the cost! Overall, poor product and bad customer service. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Katerndahl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I just asked for the complete equipment and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I just asked for the complete equipment and I only got the foot protector. I do not know when it occurred to him that it is more practical to send separately.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Weller

customer_reviews.title: They are snug so she has a ton of support but like I said I’d her feet grow they won’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they are supposed to fit snug or not. My daughter is a size 5 1/2 in kids or 8 in adults. If she gross anymore they won’t fit. They are snug so she has a ton of support but like I said I’d her feet grow they won’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchase child Medium size for my son that wear shoes 3.5/4 size
customer_reviews.author: Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Received with one kick damaged. This sell will not ...
customer_reviews.text: Received with one kick damaged. This sell will not remedy and basically blamed me for the defect. This item was opened by me and I found the heel area already torn right out of the package. No one else in my family has touched these things. We didn’t even try to try them on my son because of the tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jesse's shoes
customer_reviews.text: the shipping was fast on this pair but i had gotten the wrong size and had to send them back the next pair i got they took a little longer. grandson likes them
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Sizing leaves something to be desired
customer_reviews.text: One of these "shoes" fits great , the other one is smaller. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B

customer_reviews.title: Good pads
customer_reviews.text: Fit my kid right. Worked well for the tournament. Very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality seems good. I went by size chart and I do believe they run a little (lot) big... But it will suffice though...
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Brambl

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money but size up
customer_reviews.text: These run small. I had to buy a second pair for my son because the first pair ripped when putting them on him. He is a size 13.5 shoe. I originally ordered size 1-2 and had to order the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jmiller

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly for my 7 n 9 yo boys!! They wear shoe sizes 1.5 and 2.5. However, the material makes it hard to wear and when removed, very sticky like!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level protective equipment
customer_reviews.text: These pads fit well and provide good entry level protection in combat sport sparring.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Copney

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on.
customer_reviews.text: They are very hard to put on as they are very tight on the instep. I was very disappointed but had already worn them so I couldn't return.
customer_reviews.author: La Bella

customer_reviews.title: Just not right
customer_reviews.text: Just not right. I think it would be better if there was a bottom. The strap can be annoying. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: sagen

customer_reviews.title: Runs 2-3 sizes smaller than shoe size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. He wears a 13 and has a rather skinny foot. I wanted him to be able to wear them for a bit so I bought the size 1-2. I also measured his feet. The shoes are long enough with room to boot, but trying to shove his foot into the small opening is incredibly tuff. I thought maybe they would strecth... as I had already put his name on them... but they didn't and when I tried to strecth them out a bit little tears developed. Overall not a bad product but if your child is a size 13 go for the Mediums.
customer_reviews.author: K morales

customer_reviews.title: Need to protect you feet while sparring!
customer_reviews.text: Very necessary for my son to have these. He is working on his 2nd degree black belt and should not be sparring without them. These are a good quality, easy to apply and came packaged well!
customer_reviews.author: Beverley

customer_reviews.title: Loose and Old design
customer_reviews.text: Floppy old design from the 1960's. Won't last longer then 1-2 years and all these martial arts products like this are very cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: the ghost

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Received and they fit my boy well. I would say that this gear is great for occasional sparring and tournaments, and is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, tore first wear
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, my son's first day wearing them sparring they split. I bought the cheapest, and got the cheapest.
customer_reviews.author: Nate H

customer_reviews.title: The quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: This item is big for my son and I didn’t see anything in the description about size. The quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: Fit is good. So far the wear is good too
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses for me granddaughter. They were delivered on time. Fit is good. So far the wear is good too. Would buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Ken DiGregorio

customer_reviews.title: Very good and comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: Very good and comfortable product. I was afraid that this product might be uncomfortable, but was not the case. They are comfortable, light, give you good protection. I would recommend to measure properly your feet and follow the manufacturer's instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Robles

customer_reviews.title: Engineering at its worst.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase. I returned this product because it is not functional. Whoever designed this did a crappy job.
customer_reviews.author: Nottia Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to use. Size was correct. I don't foresee these lasting very long but since kids grow so fast, I will more than likely need a bigger size before they wear out completely. Great value overall and well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Run a bit large but get the job done. Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.author: BonnieW

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 8yo grand son. I keep his gear with mine so it doesn't get lost or played with outside of sparring class. He wore them once in class and once at a tournament. There's a hole already. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ann L.

customer_reviews.title: Like many complain
customer_reviews.text: I'll need to get used to how these straps actually wrap around to reach velcro properly. Like many complain, the ankle area is hard to get foot through. But, at least the foot part fits.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good quality. According to the measurements they should have been about 1/2" too short, but they are actually about 1" too long. They will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good price and the shoes were as expected. My son has only used them a few times, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Rita

customer_reviews.title: so far so good.. has not gotten used that much but looks good so far, I think it can be trusted....
customer_reviews.text: so far so good.. has not gotten used that much but looks good so far, I think it can be trusted....
customer_reviews.author: home user

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter love it and it protects her feet as well as the other kids she competes with.
customer_reviews.author: GOOD2GO

customer_reviews.title: Right Over Her Head!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old can lift 100 lbs of paint cans, right over her head. However, I am definitely a parent that believes in safety first. So I got her these to protect the tops of her feet. I will accept my, "Father of the Year" award, now.
customer_reviews.author: michael odishoo

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted maybe a week after I bought them. They started splitting on the sides. Won't ever buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Loni Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great for sparring.
customer_reviews.text: Good protection during sparring, but the cut in the middle would make this easier to put on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Felipe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Seem to be holding up nicely too. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: James K Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed straps and opening for foot entry way too small. Returned item but seller only refunded portion of original cost, with no explanation why
customer_reviews.author: M.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: These tend to run a little bit big, but they offered great protection for my daughter 'a feet as she tested for her black belt and needed to break a series of boards with various kicks in a row!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for these sparring shoes! Happy with them. My son’s foot grows a lot so the price and quality is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Love the sparring shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the sparring shoes. I usually wear my martial arts shoes and these are the first pair that fit nicely over the shoes and still work great
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Shipped promptly and arrived on time. Sturdy construction, exactly what we were looking for. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R

customer_reviews.title: Look great, work well
customer_reviews.text: Look great, work well. Fit my 7 yo daughters size 3 foot well with enough room for some growth. Blue was the color she wanted and they were the perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: MT Mom

customer_reviews.title: Kick for Kick
customer_reviews.text: These kicks are well made. My only problem is that their feet outgrow them.
customer_reviews.author: AvatarBender

customer_reviews.title: it was a perfect fit! I'm a big pro force fan 😄
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 6.5-7 and I ordered an adult small. This size was too big on me so I returned it and ordered a child's large, it was a perfect fit! I'm a big pro force fan 😄
customer_reviews.author: Cm216

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 6 uses
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year-old son used these for karate sparring on 6 occasions and they are already falling apart on bottom edges of both "kicks." Very disappointed in the product. I wI'll be buying a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Young

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of size
customer_reviews.text: I DNT know if I read wrong but I bought for my 9 yr old who wears size 5 in shoes I got the large well they came in and they look HUGE!! my son is on spring break with grandparents so don't know if they fit or not yet
customer_reviews.author: Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap, don’t waste your money. Foam already torn on back area (above ankle), after two work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sirosky

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sizing was not easy. But good product we even kept the size that was too big for when they grow into them.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Banks

customer_reviews.title: Wishful thinking
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these but this is my second pair. The back is poorly designed and they rip easily when putting them on or taking them off
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is using it and we found protecting as expected, we recommend this product to all.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is using it and we found protecting as expected, we recommend this product to all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: Hard for my daughter to get on her feet. Other brands are easier to slip on.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffiny Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my sparring shoes. They are great for protecting my feet during practice and sparring.
customer_reviews.author: slcmims

customer_reviews.title: Karate Gear
customer_reviews.text: My kids really liked the color selection, but I liked the price ! When I brought them into the karate school - they told me they were very good quality compared to other on-line purchases they had seen.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Very bad product, used them a couple of times and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product, used them a couple of times and broke. i give a star because i can't give a negative number.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. My son used them almost every day until his foot grew larger than them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus A Uriarte

customer_reviews.title: Good budget conscious pads.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good at a fair price overall. I don't expect them to be very durable based on my use so far as there's already more wear than I'd expect. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: Prepper1

customer_reviews.title: GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.text: These were EXACTLY what my son needed and they were cheaper here then we could've gotten them at the Karate school he attends.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Pro Force Lightning Kicks
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for my 12 year olds karate class
customer_reviews.author: SUSIEG

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out .
customer_reviews.text: These were the right size lengthwise but so tight and narrow my daughter could not get her foot into the shoe and her toes over the two straps at the bottom. I had to return and have gone with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyyy.Gould

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift based on shoe size. Was told they ran a little large by receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Jules66

customer_reviews.title: there are no creases to allow expansion at the ankle so they would easily rip. Too tight
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to get on, there are no creases to allow expansion at the ankle so they would easily rip. Too tight.
customer_reviews.author: UnbiasedReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Functions great.
customer_reviews.text: Functions great. Works for my kids to use as their sparring gear in class.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the size chart and they are way too big.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: my kids have used these for years and we reorder as they grow

customer_reviews.title: Clown sparring shoes lol
customer_reviews.text: This is like a Clown Sparring Shoes. Don’t waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: Great for sparring
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it’s covers the entire foot

customer_reviews.title: but I think the child large would have worked better.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's size 8.5. The adult small will work, but I think the child large would have worked better.

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: read other reviews about them being too small, so I ordered a size larger, and they are huge! They must be men's sized.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great but foam can rip through use. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quick and work perfect. They fit true to size.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are better than the picture very happy, thick material and does the job. nice price

customer_reviews.title: Sparring shoes
customer_reviews.text: These sparring shoes are super durable and look sharp too! My son loves to use them with his sparring at karate class!
customer_reviews.author: Peg N.

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. They fit well and protect feet as they are supposed to . Glad we could get red as that is what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are garbage. I bought a new pair because my son's ...
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. I bought a new pair because my son's old ones ripped. These did exactly the same after wearing them just twice. There is not room to get your foot in. Buy another brand. Not these.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Andrade

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the same brand our Karate Dojo offers in sets, only here on amazon I was able to buy the gloves & headgear separate so the sizing would be correct. This is important considering my 8 yr old son needed a large helmet, small gloves, and size 5-6 shoes. The pricing here was very competitive also. The product is good quality and as long as you follow the measuring directions you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Tessa L.

customer_reviews.title: There were two different sizes on the web site for ...
customer_reviews.text: There were two different sizes on the web site for the Sze I needed, the shoes were way too big I need to return for the next as down.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: only one shoe arrived!
customer_reviews.text: Size appears to be correct as length is longer than my son's foot, but the opening is too small and he can't pull them on. I should say "it" on since we only revived one of two shoes!!! Will return
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, function well and a good fit for my son's feet.
customer_reviews.text: The fit and work well for my son, pretty good product.

customer_reviews.title: What can I say.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing needs to be said. If your looking for a good set of pads. And you follow the up keep instructions you will be happy as pie.

customer_reviews.text: Good gear needed for my sons karate sparring practice & tournament.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit, looks good, lets see how hard it is whith heavy use, I hope at least 6 months is ok for me

product_meta.title: Pro Force Lightning Kicks Sparring Shoes/Footgear
product_meta.description:
ProForce Lightning Kicks provides protection for sparring over the entire foot and ankle.

Handling Fee Notification

This products shipping cost now includes a $10 per order handling fee to cover added handling costs from our supplier, and is included in the shipping costs displayed on Amazon.

For more information concerning this new fee and to view our policies, shipping rates, returns information, and sizing charts please see our seller information by clicking the link above where it says "Ships from and sold by Martial Arts Equipment Direct."
feature_bullets: Cutouts around achilles and instep provide for better dexterity and mobility
Bottom has two reinforced vinyl straps to keep boots secure
Open areas at heel, ball of foot, and toes allow for better gripping on floors
Fastens with elastic strap that secures with hook and loop closure
